title: Boards say I'm only level 3 and thus cannot post anywhere but here?
body:
TItle.

I'm most definitely level 30, and it seems like this is an issue a lot of people have had. I've heard making a post like this often fixes it, so let's hope it does.

replies.body:
Yup, it's fixed now.

We shouldn't have to do this and clog up the help & support board, though.
Update: No it's not. My profile now says I'm level 30 but I still can't make any other discussions or post comments at all. Help?

This is actually due to how Boards and the League Client operate.  Even though this is all owned and created by Riot, the systems do not directly interact with each other. This is why you can be level 30 in-game, but it won't display as such on Boards.  By posting in Boards you should force the system to sync-up and you should be able to post in other discussions in the near future.

If you aren't able to in a couple of hours still, reply back and let me know!
